Reviews.Title: “Benefits Outweight Nuisances”
Reviews.Author: Travelbug60982
Reviews.Content: family 3 stayed 4 nights aug 2629 2011 benefits 1 top mrt station close tourist 2 hawker center property 3 attractive pricing 4 triple available nuisances 1 elevators slow crowded 2 service somewhat inconsistent 1 4 days quicky corrected 3 european hotel 4 noise insulation 5 shower stall hotel rates singapore normal practice charging 50 60 extra bed double hotel offers value positives outweight negatives travelers complained breakfast expect eggs pay accordingly stay 4 5 stars hotel
